summary.span: 表示可用于呈现一组项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种，可以包含多个项，如字符串、 对象或其他元素。An is a type of that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements. 下图显示控件，其中包含以下不同类型的项：The following illustration shows a control that contains the following different types of items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - 一个控件，其中包含和一个。A control that contains an and a . ![具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 包含多种类型对象的 ListBoxListBox that contains multiple types of objects 可以使用两种或属性来指定要用于生成的内容的集合在。Use either the or the property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your . 可以设置实现的任何类型的属性。You can set the property to any type that implements . 通常用于显示数据收集或绑定集合对象。 is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an to a collection object. 如果您不想要使用实现的对象来填充，可以通过使用添加项属性。If you do not want to use an object that implements to populate the , you can add items by using the property. 中的项可以具有不同的类型。The items in an can have different types. 例如，是一个字符串的一个项，并且是另一项可以包含。For example, a can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an . 当属性设置，集合设置为只读和固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is set to read-only and fixed-size. 这意味着，您不能将项添加到集合直接。This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly. 时正在使用，将属性设置为`null`删除该集合并还原到的使用情况，后者将是一个空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 每个类型都有相应的项容器类型。Each type has a corresponding item container type. 每个相应的项容器追加`Item`到其名称。The corresponding item container for each appends `Item` to its name. 例如，对于，项容器都控制; 对于，它们是控件。For example, for , the item containers are controls; for , they are controls. 您可以显式创建中的每个项的容器类型，但不需要。You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the , but it is not necessary. 当不显式创建的容器类型时，将生成一个包含项集合中的数据项。When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection. 例如，如果将绑定到字符串对象的集合的属性，不显式创建对象，但将生成一个用于每个字符串。For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the property of a , you do not explicitly create objects, but the will generate one for each string. 可以使用访问生成的项容器属性。You can access a generated item container by using the property. > [!NOTE] > UI 自动化的某些功能无法正常工作时包含重复的对象。Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an contains duplicate objects. 如果对象出现多次，仅第一个实例出现在自动化树中。If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree. (两个对象**x**并**y**被认为是重复项，如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`返回`true`。)(Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > 尽管对象**x**正在使用返回的值**x。**`GetHashCode()`While an object **x** is in use by an the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()` 不得更改。must not change. 为此值的更改都不受支持，并可能导致不可预知的行为。Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior. 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示将数据绑定到。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名为类`MyData`，它是一个简单字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 以下示例将绑定的对象到`MyData`。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示上一示例中创建的控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何填充通过使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将添加以下不同类型的项到:The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - 一个控件包含其他对象。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示在上一示例中创建。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 下面的示例演示如何使用不同样式和模板化相关的属性提供的。The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the . 在此示例绑定到的集合`Task`对象。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 呈现时下, 图是该示例的屏幕截图。The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered. ![ItemsControl 示例屏幕截图](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 两个其他样式相关的属性，不会显示如下和。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的交替项容器的数目，该控件可使交替容器具有唯一外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers in the , which enables alternating containers to have a unique appearance.

value.span: 中交替项容器的数目。

span.span: The number of alternating item containers in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性，可以指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，可以指定在每个第三个项的交替背景色。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 分配给每个项容器中。The is assigned to each item container in the . 在 0 处开始，直到它递增减去 1 和 0 然后重新启动。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果为 3，有七个项中的，下表列出了为每个项。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |中的项的位置 Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有几种方法可用于指定不同的外观的交替项容器。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一种方法是将绑定到的项容器的属性。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然后，可以使用以指定应将哪个值应用于具有特定的项容器值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 此外可以使用触发器根据的值的项容器的属性值更改其。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例指定(派生自) 具有交替项容器 (其为类型)，并指定不同的背景和前台，让每个。The following example specifies that the (which inherits from ) has alternating item containers (which are of type ) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one. 该示例将绑定和属性设置为，并提供的每个属性。The example binds the and properties to the and provides an for each property. summary.span: 获取或设置源对象上的值的路径，以用作对象的可视表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.

value.span: 源对象上的值的路径。

span.span: The path to a value on the source object.

value.span: 这可以将任何路径，或者 XPath 是如"@Name"。

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是定义默认模板，介绍如何显示的数据对象的简单方法。This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在以下示例中，静态资源名为`places`定义为一系列`Place`对象，其中，每个`Place`对象具有`CityName`属性和一个`State`属性。In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property. 前缀`src`映射到命名空间的数据源`Places`定义。The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined. 前缀`scm`并`dat`映射到和命名空间，分别。The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the and namespaces, respectively. 下面的示例创建是按城市名称排序并按状态分组的数据集合的视图。The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state. [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 该视图可以是绑定源，如以下示例所示。The view can be a binding source, as in the following example. 由于指定，则每个`Place`对象还会显示其`CityName`值。Because of the specified , each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value. 如果未指定，并且没有任何，则显示基础集合 （在此情况下，"SDKSample.Place"） 中的每个对象的字符串表示形式。If is not specified and there is no , then the displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place"). [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，则属性指定是否用例可确定是否中选择一项。When the property is set to `true`, the property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an . 例如，如果包含仅在大小写不同，如"ITEM"和"item"，第一个字符串会始终选择，不考虑输入的大小写的两个字符串。For example, if an contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，其中包含字符串、"DOG"、"CAT"、"dog"和"cat"。The following example creates a that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat". 该示例将绑定属性设置为属性的。The example binds the property to the property of a . 如果选中此复选框，并且用户"dog"，类型中的第三个项处于选中状态。If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the is selected. 如果用户取消选中复选框并键入"dog"，因为大小写并不搜索的条件，则选择第一项。If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于将项添加到。This property may be used to add items to an . 添加到子对象隐式地将其添加到为对象。Adding a child to an object implicitly adds it to the for the object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过集合语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 要访问的集合对象本身的属性是只读的并且集合本身为读写。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, and the collection itself is read-write. 请注意，使用任一或属性来指定应该用于生成的内容的集合在。Note that you use either the or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 当属性设置，集合进行只读的且具有固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 时正在使用中，设置属性设置为`null`删除该集合并还原到的使用情况，这将是一个空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreElements**OneOrMoreElements* 一个或多个对象。One or more objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示将数据绑定到。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名为类`MyData`，它是一个简单字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 以下示例将绑定的对象到`MyData`。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示上一示例中创建的控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何填充通过使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将添加以下不同类型的项到:The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - 一个控件包含其他对象。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示在上一示例中创建。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 请注意，是视图，因此，可以使用如排序、 筛选和分组视图相关的功能。Note that the is a view, so you can use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping. 例如，如果您拥有的实例， `myListBox`，可以执行以下操作来进行排序的内容。For example, if you have an instance of a , `myListBox`, you can do the following to sort the content of the . 在此示例中，`Content`是要作为排序依据的属性的名称。In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by. [!code-csharp[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#sort)] [!code-vb[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#sort)] 注意： 当这样做，如果该控件直接绑定到一个集合，使用默认集合视图，而且排序条件应用于所有其他控件直接绑定到同一个集合。Note that when you do this, if the control is bound to a collection directly, the default collection view is used, and the sort criteria are applied to all other controls bound to the same collection directly. 视图将不会是默认视图，如果属性绑定到。The view will not be the default view if the property is bound to a . 如果你直接绑定到一个集合，则可以执行以下操作以获取默认视图：If your is bound directly to a collection, then you can do the following to get the default view: [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#myview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#myview)] [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getview)] 或者，可以指定筛选、 排序和分组中的条件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或通过使用代码。Alternately, you can specify filtering, sorting, and grouping criteria in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code by using a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关，默认值指定。For the , the default specifies the . 有关，默认使用。For , the default uses . 有关，默认使用。For , the default uses . 若要影响的布局中的项，此属性用于指定。To affect the layout of the items in an , you use this property to specify a . 为可视化自定义提供极大的灵活性，并提供许多样式和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 您使用属性或属性来设置样式，以影响包含的数据项目的元素的外观。You use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于，生成的容器是控制; 对于，它们是控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 如果您的控件上使用分组，则可以使用或属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 若要指定数据对象的可视化效果，请使用或属性。To specify the visualization of the data objects, use the or the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 若要创建水平，可以创建一个模板，指定水平并将其设置为属性。To create a horizontal , you can create a template that specifies a horizontal and set it as the property. 下面的示例演示创建水平。The following example shows a that creates a horizontal . [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，可以执行以下操作来获得相同的结果。Alternatively, you can do the following to achieve the same results. 在这种情况下，创建基于内容的项的布局由指定面板。In this case, the creates the panel for the layout of the items based on what is specified by the . remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型：** 此属性可用于将项添加到。**Content Model:** This property may be used to add items to an . 一种常见方案是使用如， ，或以显示数据集合，或者将绑定集合对象。A common scenario is to use an such as a , , or to display a data collection, or to bind an to a collection object. 若要将绑定到集合对象，使用属性。To bind an to a collection object, use the property. 请注意，属性支持绑定默认情况下。Note that the property supports binding by default. 当属性设置，集合进行只读的且具有固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 时正在使用，将属性设置为`null`删除该集合并还原到的使用情况，后者将是一个空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 当是在不使用，此属性的值是`null`，并将其设置为`null`不起作用。When is not in use, the value of this property is `null`, and setting it to `null` has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下不需要实现自己的集合。In most cases you do not need to implement your own collections. 相反，请考虑使用或其他现有集合。Instead, consider using or other existing collections. 详细信息，请参阅"集合对象用作绑定源"中[绑定源概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)。For more information, see the "Collection Objects Used as Binding Source" in [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用指定数据对象的可视化效果。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果你绑定到集合对象，并且不提供使用特定显示说明，生成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的每个项是基础集合中每个对象的字符串表示形式。If your is bound to a collection object and you do not provide specific display instructions using a , the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection. 当您将设置上，则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，如下所示生成 (使用为例):When you set an on an , the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is generated as follows (using the as an example): 1. 在内容生成过程发出的请求若要创建的每个数据项的容器。During content generation, the initiates a request for the to create a container for each data item. 有关，该容器是。For , the container is a . 生成器回调到以准备该容器。The generator calls back into the to prepare the container. 2. 准备工作的一部分涉及到的复制的要的。Part of the preparation involves the copying of the of the to be the of the . 3. 类似于所有类型，的包含。Similar to all types, the of a contains a . 当应用该模板时，它会创建其绑定到的。When the template is applied, it creates a whose is bound to the of the . 4. 最后，的适用到其自身，这产生了[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Finally, the applies that to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果有多个定义，并且你想要提供用于以编程方式选择并应用逻辑，使用属性。If you have more than one defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a , use the property. 为可视化自定义提供极大的灵活性，并提供许多样式和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用属性或属性来设置样式，以影响包含的数据项目的元素的外观。Use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于，生成的容器是控制; 对于，它们是控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 若要影响的项的布局，请使用属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果您的控件上使用分组，则可以使用或属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
